name: Cilantro Lime Catfish
author: Cyndi Lauterbach
summary: I was looking for a recipe for Mexican catfish and wasn't able to find exactly what I wanted, so I made my own version. I wasn't sure what it would end up like, but it tasted great.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Stir cilantro and garlic into the melted butter; cook about 1 minute
Season catfish fillets with salt and black pepper; lay gently into the butter mixture
Place a cover on the skillet
Cook fillets 10 minutes, turn, and continue cooking until the fish flakes easily with a fork and is lightly browned, about 10 minutes more
Squeeze lemon juice and lime juice over the fillets to serve
